column5: Great living area for resting and relaxing. Quite and friendly suburban neighborhood. Very nice home in suburbia Denton. I have pets but they are very friendly and inviting. If you are uncomfortable with dogs I can place them in their kennel during your stay. The room you would be staying in is very accommodating for travelers. There is a work space and 55' inch smart TV.
column8: Super quite, comfortable, relaxing, and inviting.
